resources.string: Activity shows lists of all albums you have on your phone.
Activity shows lists of all artists you have on your phone.
Activity shows current song you have playing on your phone.
Activity shows playlists you have on your phone.
Activity shows radio stations you have on your phone.

1) View all albums

2) Show album information. 

3) Make each song clickable.

1) View all artists

2) Show each artist information. 

3) Show all albums under each artists.
1) View media player\n\n2) Show list of songs.
1) View current playlists\n\n2) Show all songs in playlists.
1) View all radio stations\n\n2) Show information of each radio station.
